title: What happened to Terra Luna: one year after collapse
description: In May 2022, the crypto community was shattered by the crash of the Terra ecosystem. One year after, we are reconstructing the events, from luna’s depeg to Terraform CEO Do Kwon becoming a criminal. Terra and its sibling token LUNA…

title: Binance’s Regional Market Head Rumored To Be CZ’s Successor
description:
A recent report signaled the possibility of a new Binance CEO succeeding Changpeng Zhao, amid the US regulators’ increasing scrutiny over the crypto exchange. The people familiar with the matter hinted that Richard Teng, the recently appointed Head of Binance’s regional markets outside the US would take up the position if Zhao resigns. Over the […]

The post Binance’s Regional Market Head Rumored To Be CZ’s Successor appeared first on Coin Edition.
